Name: Alien Vision
About the game: A mirror image is readily seen, you need to fly high to have a bird's eye view or glimpse and you need to equip yourself with night vision gadgets to have a clear vision, at dark. But nature has endowed such unique capabilities to a selected few of its creations like Cats and Snakes, who are lucky to see everything distinctly without any external aids, even when it is dark just like they see in broad daylight. Alien Vision displays one's images and objects, the way it is seen by an Alien or by yourself in a new Avatar, as an Alien. The view is customizable with features to look at yourself and at any object differently, using four primary modes viz. Night, Old TV, Edge & Thermal and 22 secondary visual effects, either individually or in combination. Reward and enrich your eyesight with Alien Vision. Note 1 : Software requires a Webcam Note 2 : Install your respective webcam drivers before running Alien Vision Note 3 : Webcam permission needs to be allowed / granted in your Antivirus
